item.title: me, myself & my avatars
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: me, ,myself & my avatars vr // unity // experience this virtual reality experience is about the so-called homunculus, a mapping of the movements and sensations experienced by the body located in the neocortex.

item.title: wo du mich findest
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: wo du mich findest theater // robots // micro python “where you find me” (wo du mich findest) was an interactive theater piece made by the collective laokoon for the kammerspiele münchen.

item.title: memory of things
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: memory of things microcontroller // research // installation “memory of things” is an interactive performance of things and was my research project at the “academy for theatre and digitality”.

item.title: shybot
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: shybot robot // python // computer vision shybot is the prototype of a robot with human flaws. equipped with a camera shybot recognizes human faces and immediately turns away, because, well, he is very shy.

item.title: soap
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: soap - resurrection theater // video // python “s.o.a.p – resurrection” was the final episode of a trashy scifi theater series called s.

item.title: blender in the cabana
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: blender in the cabana python // processing // blender on daniel shiffmans amazing youtube channel the coding train is a series called “coding in the cabana”.

item.title: they live
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: they live ar // js // street art “they live “ is an art installation and an homage to john carpenters film from 1988.

item.title: morph
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: morph video // animation // processing morph is an project by the theater and performance collective neus künstler theater. i made for this project a 50 minute long animation of pixels populating the canvas.

item.title: about
item.author: mailto:hi@zecktos.net (zecktos)
item.description: about me i am a german artist working in theater and tinkering with computers. in my work i am combining my experience as a performer with my interest in programming, realtime video and animation.
